color: p-4 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-xl border border-solid border-orange-100

title.class: dark:border-stone-600 dark:text-sky-400 pb-2 uppercase border-0 border-b-2 border-stone-200 border-solid

link.class: flex flex-row intems-center cursor-pointer block text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400

label: text-stone-500 flex flex-col my-1 font-semibold dark:text-stone-400

input.class: dark:text-gray-100 dark:border-gray-600 dark:bg-gray-600 w-full p-2 border border-solid rounded border-stone-200 placeholder-stone-400

buttons.login: w-full cursor-pointer text-white bg-gradient-to-r from-green-400 via-green-500 to-green-600 hover:bg-gradient-to-br focus:ring-4 focus:outline-none focus:ring-green-300 dark:focus:ring-green-800 shadow-lg shadow-green-500/50 dark:shadow-lg dark:shadow-green-800/80 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-4 py-2 text-center
